attributes.action: I want to make it law to offer housing to all those without housing
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is all over the UK, any city and town comes along with people who haven't even got anywhere to turn or anywhere to go, it's horrendous we have this situation in such a forward well estaished society with people earning millions and people completely without, let's make it faster and this needs to be dealt with as soon as possible, everyone deserves help! Let's stand together
attributes.background: I find it absolutely disgusting that even to this day people without housing are left on the streets without help for months sometimes years, it needs to be law I feel to offer housing and help to anyone I need, it is not acceptable to allow someone without a home in such a society. Time to change!
